mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SEOUL_ANIMALHOSPITAL (LASTMODTS, DTLSTATENM, LINDJOBGBNNM, BPLCNM, CLGENDDT, DCBYMD, CLGSTDT, TRDSTATEGBN, TRDSTATENM, OPNSFTEAMCODE, SITETEL, SITEWHLADDR, GUOFFICE, DTLSTATEGBN, RDNPOSTNO, UPDATEGBN, UPDATEDT, APVPERMYMD, RDNWHLADDR, ROPNYMD, MGTNO) VALUES(#{lastmodts}, #{dtlstatenm}, #{lindjobgbnnm}, #{bplcnm}, #{clgenddt}, #{dcbymd}, #{clgstdt}, #{trdstategbn}, #{trdstatenm}, #{opnsfteamcode}, #{sitetel}, #{sitewhladdr}, #{guoffice}, #{dtlstategbn}, #{rdnpostno}, #{updategbn}, #{updatedt}, #{apvpermymd}, #{rdnwhladdr}, #{ropnymd}, #{mgtno})
